title: Community Living Alternatives is hiring!
text:
Community Living Alternatives is hiring! We provide direct residential support services to individuals with Intellectual and Developmental disabilities. This includes physical assistance, cooking, cleaning, medical appointments, community participation, skill building in healthy relationships and empowerment in their lives per individual plans of service.

To apply for a Direct Support Professional position you need:

• High School Diploma or Equivalent Required; Associates Degree in Human Services or related field or equivalent experience preferred.

• Clear criminal background

• Valid driver’s license with clean record and a minimum of 3 years U.S. driving experience

• Vehicle with verifiable auto insurance

• Ability to read, write and interpret documents

• Compassionate attitude and high integrity
